Method Detail

encryptUserAndProjectId

public static String encryptUserAndProjectId(String userId,
                                             long projectId)
                                      throws EncryptionException
Encrypts a user ID and a project ID so that it can be included in an URL without leaking information. The encryption key is the same across all servers so that any server can decrypt a request.

Parameters:
userId - user ID
projectId - project ID
Returns:
an encrypted string safe to include in an URL
Throws:
EncryptionException

decryptUserId

public static String decryptUserId(String idEnc)
                            throws EncryptionException
Decrypt the user ID from an encrypted string generated by encryptUserAndProjectId(String, long).

Parameters:
idEnc - string generated by encryptUserAndProjectId
Returns:
the userId parameter that was originally passed to encryptUserAndProjectId or null if the encrypted string was invalid
Throws:
EncryptionException

decryptProjectId

public static long decryptProjectId(String idEnc)
                             throws EncryptionException
Decrypt the project ID from an encrypted string generated by encryptUserAndProjectId(String, long).

Parameters:
idEnc - string generated by encryptUserAndProjectId
Returns:
the projectId parameter that was originally passed to encryptUserAndProjectId or StorageIo.INVALID_PROJECTID if the encrypted string was invalid
Throws:
EncryptionException
